name: Pixel Swords
description:
PIXEL SWORDS

This is a simple pixel art medieval sword game. This game is made as a prototype for testing out some features and is not complete.

FEATURES

  • Double Jump
  • Slide
  • Wall Climb

CONTROLS

  • Use A/D or Left/Right arrow to Move around.
  • Use Space to do simple Jump and double Jump.
  • Use Left mouse button to use sword.
  • Use Shift while moving to slide.
  • Press Left/Right arrow and jump on wall to wall climb.

Goto my Github page to download the project link - Github Project
